mapper.select: SELECT DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID AS disposalFreezeEventUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, EVENT_CODE AS eventCode, EVENT_NAME AS eventName, EVENT_TYPE_UUID AS eventTypeUuid, REVIEW_DATE AS reviewDate, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, END_YN AS endYn, TERMINATOR_UUID AS terminatorUuid, END_DATE AS endDate, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT

SELECT DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID AS disposalFreezeEventUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, EVENT_CODE AS eventCode, EVENT_NAME AS eventName, EVENT_TYPE_UUID AS eventTypeUuid, REVIEW_DATE AS reviewDate, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, END_YN AS endYn, TERMINATOR_UUID AS terminatorUuid, END_DATE AS endDate, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT WHERE DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID = #{disposalFreezeEventUuid}
mapper.update: UPDATE DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT SET STATUS_UUID = #{statusUuid}, EVENT_CODE = #{eventCode}, EVENT_NAME = #{eventName}, EVENT_TYPE_UUID = #{eventTypeUuid}, REVIEW_DATE = #{reviewDate}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, NOTES = #{notes}, END_YN = #{endYn}, TERMINATOR_UUID = #{terminatorUuid}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, INSERT_UUID = #{insertUuid}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate}, UPDATE_UUID = #{updateUuid}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID = #{disposalFreezeEventUuid}

INSERT INTO DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT ( DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID, STATUS_UUID, EVENT_CODE, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_TYPE_UUID, REVIEW_DATE, DESCRIPTION, NOTES, END_YN, TERMINATOR_UUID, END_DATE, INSERT_UUID, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_UUID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{disposalFreezeEventUuid}, #{statusUuid}, #{eventCode}, #{eventName}, #{eventTypeUuid}, #{reviewDate}, #{description}, #{notes}, #{endYn}, #{terminatorUuid}, #{endDate}, #{insertUuid}, #{insertDate}, #{updateUuid}, #{updateDate} )
